input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item name information.

Item name:
CafePress - Con Abuela - Natural Canvas Tote Bag, Cloth Shopping Bag

Item specifications:
Professionally printed, thousands of designs to choose from.
Small measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles
Medium features full side & bottom support gussets, measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" reinforced fabric handle
Make this shopping tote your new favorite grocery bag, library tote, or beach tote. These bags are also great gifts for him or her, teachers or students, young or old, for any occasion.
Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. IMPORTED.
We offer 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the Paul & Taylor Men's Leather Checkbook Cover Bifold Wallet, available in a variety of colors to suit your style. Made from premium leather, this wallet is built to last and looks stunning. It features a carbon copy separator and currency compartment, making it perfect for keeping your finances organized. The extra slot and pen holder provide ample storage space, while the pull-out album complete with six card and photo slots allows you to easily access your important documents. With its slim line and simple design, this wallet is both practical and fashionable. So why settle for a boring, mass-produced wallet when you can have a stylish and durable leather option? Upgrade your accessory game and order the Paul & Taylor Men's Leather Checkbook Cover Bifold Wallet today!
input_text.Response B: Introducing the CafePress Con Abuela Natural Canvas Tote Bag, the perfect accessory for your everyday needs! Made from sturdy canvas material, this 15"x15" bag features 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles that make carrying easy and comfortable. The full side and bottom support gussets provide extra room and durability, making it perfect for carrying heavy items. And with thousands of designs to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect bag to fit your style. Plus, the natural canvas material is machine washable on cold and can be tumble dried on low for easy care. And if that's not enough, this imported bag also comes with a 100% money back guarantee so you can buy with confidence. Don't settle for a boring, plain tote bag - upgrade to the CafePress Con Abuela Natural Canvas Tote Bag today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
